content.text:
# New Jersey Coastal Heritage Trail Route

The New Jersey Coastal Heritage Trail Route extends along eastern and southern coast of New Jersey for nearly . It travels along the Raritan Bay from Perth Amboy to Sandy Hook,  along Jersey Shore at the Atlantic Ocean to Cape May, and along the Delaware Bay to the Delaware Memorial Bridge. The trail encompasses a variety of New Jersey state parks along with facilities under the jurisdiction of the National Park Service.

* Perth Amboy Harbor Walk
;Monmouth County

* Sandy Hook, Gateway National Recreation Area
* Sea Brightâ€“Monmouth Beach Seawall
